section.heading: Asymptomatic testing for COVID-19.

para.text: Each school shall conduct weekly asymptomatic testing for the COVID-19 virus of:
Before November 1, 2021, at least 10% of its students attending in-person learning;
Beginning November 1, 2021, at last 15% of its students attending in-person learning; and
From November 15, 2021, through January 15, 2022, at least 20% of its students attending in-person learning.

The testing methodology a school uses to comply with the requirements of paragraph (1) of this subsection shall be of equal or greater accuracy than the methodology the school employed as of October 1, 2021.
A special education school may seek a waiver from the Office of the State Superintendent of Education for the testing requirements required in subsection (a) of this section.
